page-home.description:
How much do you really know about the islands of Guadeloupe? I propose you a quiz to check your basic knowledge on French overseas territory.

During the questions of this quiz, we come back on the geography of Guadeloupe, the local specificities, the regional dishes, the history of the archipelago, etc.
page-home.description2: For each question, find the right answer among the 4 propositions and try to make the perfect score of 100%.
